fields.title: Python Basics Assessment
fields.description: Test your knowledge of Python fundamentals including variables, data types, control flow, and functions.
fields.instructions: Read each question carefully. Choose the best answer from the options provided.

fields.title: Django Framework Test
fields.description: Comprehensive test covering Django models, views, templates, forms, and authentication.
fields.instructions: Answer all questions. Some questions may have multiple correct answers.

fields.title: Data Science Concepts
fields.description: Test your understanding of basic data science concepts, statistical methods, and data analysis.
fields.instructions: Use the provided datasets to answer questions. Show your work where required.
